title: User Login from New Device Flagged as Suspicious
description: A user's login attempt from a new device in a different country is automatically flagged as suspicious, and their account is temporarily locked.

tasks.description: Acknowledge the security alert for the user's account.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the details of the suspicious login attempt.

tasks.description: Send a verification code to the user's registered email address or phone number.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully sends the verification code.

tasks.description: Once the user provides the correct code, remove the temporary lock from their account.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent verifies the code and successfully unlocks the account.
